metadata.feature_description: Navigation controls for paginated data in tag statistics and popular content

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify pagination sections exist in Community Analytics

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with Trending Tags and Popular Content sections
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard loaded successfully with both Trending Tags and Popular Content sections visible for all modules (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki)

steps.action: Scroll down to view Trending Tags and Popular Content sections
steps.expected: Sections should be visible with either data or empty state message
steps.actual: Both sections display correctly showing 'No trending tags available in selected period' and 'No popular content available in selected period' messages

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with single page of data (empty state)

steps.action: Verify pagination controls are hidden when no data exists
steps.expected: Pagination prev/next buttons should not be visible when there's no data
steps.actual: Pagination controls are correctly hidden when no data is available. Empty state message displays appropriately.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify date range change updates pagination data

steps.action: Change date range from Week to Year
steps.expected: Charts and data should update to show yearly data
steps.actual: Date range changed to '9 Feb 2025 - 8 Feb 2026' successfully. Charts updated to show monthly scale (FEB through JAN). Data sections still show no data available as expected for this test environment.

steps.action: Attempt to click next/previous pagination buttons
steps.expected: Should be able to navigate between pages of tag statistics and popular content
steps.actual: Pagination controls (prev/next buttons) are not visible because there is no community activity data in this test environment to paginate. The pager UI elements only appear when totalResults > 0.

issues: Cannot test pagination navigation without community activity data. The test environment has no content in Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, or Wiki modules to generate paginated tag statistics or popular content.

steps.action: Look for page number indicator in pagination controls
steps.expected: Should see current page number or page indicator
steps.actual: Cannot verify page indicator as pagination controls are hidden due to no data. Code review shows pagination uses simple prev/next arrows without explicit page number display.

issues: Page indicator cannot be tested without data. Based on code review, the pagination implementation uses simple prev/next arrow navigation rather than numbered page indicators.

observations: Code review confirms pagination is implemented in pageActivities.js with prev/next button controls bound to pagerPrevClass and pagerNextClass
Pagination uses pager.init() with pageSize of 6 for tag statistics and 5 for popular content
The pagerVisible binding correctly hides pagination controls when there's no data (totalResults === 0)
API endpoints GetTagStats and GetPopularContent support pagination with pageIndex and pageSize parameters
This is a fresh test environment with no community activity data - all social modules (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) have zero content
The pagination feature code exists and appears correctly implemented, but UI verification of actual pagination navigation requires community activity data which is not present in this environment
